description: Sets the password for the guest user smbguest. The smbguest user is the user when the authentication method for the file share is set to GuestAccess. This operation only supported for S3 File Gateways.

parameters.name: GatewayARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 File Gateway the SMB file share is associated with.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password that you want to set for your SMB server.

nested_items.name: GatewayARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the  ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.
